reasoning: This trade is a win-win that addresses each team's primary needs by swapping from positions of strength. Team A has incredible RB depth and can afford to trade Derrick Henry to acquire an elite WR in Justin Jefferson, creating a dominant receiving corps with Chase and St. Brown. Team B has a glaring weakness at RB and this trade provides a massive upgrade, swapping the injury-prone J.K. Dobbins for a workhorse in Derrick Henry. They also receive Davante Adams, a top-tier WR, to replace Jefferson, ensuring their own WR group remains strong. The projected values are nearly identical, making this a fair and mutually beneficial deal.
